Text: In the future, a man travels to the ends of the earth to find that the perfect woman is always under his nose. When successful businessman Sam Treadwell finds that his android wife, Cherry model 2000 has blown a fuse, he hires sexy renegade tracker E. Johnson to find her exact duplicate.
Sorry guys, I accidentally pasted my description from TMDB. It's here if anyone needs it for their database. http://www.themoviedb.org/movie/169464-cherry-2000
